subSections.title: Readings
Compounds
Etymology 1
subSections.text:
{{ja-kanjitab|yomi=o|ねん}}
From {{bor|ja|ltc|-|sort=ねん}} {{m|zh|年|tr=nen||year}}. Compare modern {{cog|cmn|-}} reading ''nián'', {{cog|hak|-}} ''ngièn'', {{cog|yue|-}} ''nin{{sup|4}}''.

subSections.title: Noun
Suffix
Etymology 2
Noun
subSections.text:
{{ja-noun|とし}}

# {{lb|ja|sort=とし|obsolete}} [[grain]], particularly [[rice]]
# {{lb|ja|sort=とし|obsolete}} a grain [[harvest]], a grain [[crop]]
# a [[year]]
# [[age]]

subSections.title: Derived terms
subSections.text:
* {{ja-r|年%神|^とし%がみ}}: the [[spirit]] or [[god]] of the [[year]]
* {{ja-r|年 を 取る|とし を とる}}: to [[pass]] [[New Years]]; to [[age]]
